Thief.NAME: Thief
Thief.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Whenever you play an attack gain a gold.

Coin Toss.NAME: Coin Toss
Coin Toss.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

Loose Change.NAME: Loose Change
Loose Change.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card from your hand.

Best Bag.NAME: Best Bag #1
Best Bag.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! gold. NL Exhaust.

Bouncing Bag.NAME: Bouncing Bag
Bouncing Bag.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies !M! times. NL Lose 10 gold.

Cheapskate.NAME: Cheapskate
Cheapskate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If Bankrupt draw !M! cards.

Old Surprise.NAME: Old Surprise
Old Surprise.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL If Bankrupt gain !M! gold. NL Exhaust.

Half Penny.NAME: Half Penny
Half Penny.DESCRIPTION: If Bankrupt apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.
Half Penny.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If Bankrupt apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies.

Bribe.NAME: Bribe
Bribe.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Prosperous apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

No Coin.NAME: No Coin
No Coin.DESCRIPTION: Lose 5 gold. NL If Bankrupt draw !M! cards.

Coin Barrage.NAME: Coin Barrage
Coin Barrage.DESCRIPTION: Lose 50 gold. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

Hard Crash.NAME: Hard Crash
Hard Crash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 10 gold. NL If Bankrupt gain !M! Strength.

Heavy Coin.NAME: Heavy Coin
Heavy Coin.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lose 5 gold. Exhaust.

Secret Bags.NAME: Secret Bags
Secret Bags.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Spend all [R]. NL Gain !M! gold X times. NL Exhaust

Bigger Bag.NAME: Bigger Bag
Bigger Bag.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL Place a copy of this card into your discard pile. All Bigger Bag cards give 1 additional gold this combat
Bigger Bag.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold. NL Place a copy of this card into your discard pile. All Bigger Bag cards give 2 additional gold this combat

Gold Rush.NAME: Gold Rush
Gold Rush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! gold. NL Exhaust.

Sleight of Hand.NAME: Sleight of Hand
Sleight of Hand.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Whenever you play a skill gain !M! gold.

Rainmaker.NAME: Rainmaker
Rainmaker.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if Prosperous gain !M! [R].

Bag Fu.NAME: Bag Fu
Bag Fu.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if Prosperous gain !M! Thorns.
Bag Fu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn if Prosperous gain !M! Thorns.

Gold Fu.NAME: Gold Fu
Gold Fu.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if Prosperous draw !M! cards.
Gold Fu.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, if Prosperous draw !M! cards.

Coin Trick.NAME: Coin Trick
Coin Trick.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Draw !M! cards NL Discard 1 card.

Greed is Good.NAME: Greed is Good
Greed is Good.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold for each enemy. NL Draw 1 card.

Payment Accepted.NAME: Payment Accepted
Payment Accepted.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! gold. NL If Bankrupt deal !D! damage. Exhaust

Counting Desk.NAME: Counting Desk
Counting Desk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL At the end of your turn, lose !M! Dexterity.

Eat The Coins.NAME: Eat The Coins
Eat The Coins.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 gold. NL If Bankrupt increase your Max HP by !M!. Exhaust.

Coin Caddy.NAME: Coin Caddy
Coin Caddy.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength. NL If Prosperous gain 1 Strength. NL Exhaust.
Coin Caddy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength. NL If Prosperous gain 3 Strength. NL Exhaust.

Empty Wallet.NAME: Empty Wallet
Empty Wallet.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 gold NL Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Vulnerable.

Pay To Win.NAME: Pay To Win
Pay To Win.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 gold. NL Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity.

Smash & Run.NAME: Smash & Run
Smash & Run.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL If Prosperous gain [R] [G] [B] [R].

Neow's Coin.NAME: Neow's Coin
Neow's Coin.DESCRIPTION: If Bankrupt deal !D! damage and gain !B! Block.

Cash To Burn.NAME: Cash to Burn
Cash To Burn.DESCRIPTION: Lose 10 gold. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

Flood The Market.NAME: Flood the Market
Flood The Market.DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! damage for each Exhausted card. (Deal !D! damage) NL Exhaust.

Money Injection.NAME: Money Injection
Money Injection.DESCRIPTION: Lose 20 gold. NL Gain [R]. NL Exhaust.
Money Injection.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose 20 gold. NL Gain [R] [R]. NL Exhaust.

Protection Money.NAME: Protection Money
Protection Money.DESCRIPTION: Lose 50 gold. NL Gain !M! Artifact. NL Exhaust.

Bed Bank.NAME: Bed Bank
Bed Bank.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Exhaust you hand. Gain !M! gold for each Exhausted card.

Empty Hands.NAME: Empty Hands
Empty Hands.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Dexterity. NL If Prosperous gain 1 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.
Empty Hands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Dexterity. NL If Prosperous gain 3 Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

Dive.NAME: Dive
Dive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block for the next !M! turn. NL Exhaust.

Gold Bar.NAME: Gold Bar
Gold Bar.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if Bankrupt gain !M! Strength and !M! Dexterity.

Treasure Hunt.NAME: Treasure Hunt
Treasure Hunt.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if Bankrupt ALL enemies lose !M! Strength.

Big Spender.NAME: Big Spender
Big Spender.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to your gold. NL Lose all your gold.
Big Spender.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal damage equal to your gold. NL Lose all your gold.

Lucky Find.NAME: Lucky Find
Lucky Find.DESCRIPTION: If Prosperous, gain a random relic at the end of combat. Lose 100 Gold. NL Exhaust.

Exchange.NAME: Exchange
Exchange.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Weak. NL Gain 30 gold. NL Exhaust.

Five Finger Discount.NAME: Five finger Discount
Five Finger Discount.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 5 times. NL If this kills the enemy, gain !M! gold.

Sleeping Cash.NAME: Sleeping Cash
Sleeping Cash.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

Market Love.NAME: Market Love
Market Love.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn if Bankrupt, heal !M! HP.
Market Love.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn if Bankrupt, heal !M! HP.

Hoard.NAME: Hoard
Hoard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! gold for each Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.
